T02bsu052_u:4: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ paripūrṇena
T02bsu052_u:8: mañjuśriyā ca kumārabhūtena, maitreyeṇa ca, asaṅgapratibhānena ca,
T02bsu052_u:12: upasaṃkramya vihārasya bahirdvāre sthito 'bhūttathāgatasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya
T02bsu052_u:13: athāyuṣmānapi śāradvatīputraḥ svakādvihārānniṣkramya yena tathāgatavihārastenopasaṃkrāmadbhagavato darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya |
T02bsu052_u:16: mahākauṣṭhilaḥ, anye ca mahāśrāvakāḥ svakasvakebhyo vihārebhyo niṣkramya
T02bsu052_u:17: yena bhagavato vihārastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ, upasaṃkramya ekānte tasthuḥ ||
T02bsu052_u:18: atha khalu bhagavānabhikrāntābhikrāntaṃ mahāśrāvakasaṃnipātaṃ viditvā svakādvihārānniṣkramya bahirdvārasyaikānte prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat |
T02bsu052_u:19: niṣadya ca bhagavān jānanneva āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputramāmantrayate sma -
T02bsu052_u:21: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - sarvaprathamataraṃ bhagavan mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastathāgatavihāradvāre sthitaḥ, paścādvayaṃ bhagavantaṃ draṣṭukāmāḥ ||
T02bsu052_u:22: atha khalu bhagavān jānanneva mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma -
T02bsu052_u:23: satyaṃ kila tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ sarvaprathamataraṃ tathāgatavihāradvāre sthitastathāgatasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya ca? evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - evametat bhagavan, evametat
T02bsu052_u:25: tathāgatavihārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ, upasaṃkramya ekānte sthito bhagavato darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya |
T02bsu052_u:27: atṛpto 'haṃ tathāgatasya darśanena vandanena paryupāsanena ca |
T02bsu052_u:28: yadapyahaṃ bhagavan tathāgatamupasaṃkramāmi darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,
T02bsu052_u:30: sacedbhagavan (SaptaŚ, Vaidya 341) tathāgato draṣṭavyo vanditavyaḥ paryupāsitavyaḥ, evaṃ draṣṭavyaḥ, evaṃ vanditavyaḥ,
T02bsu052_u:31: evaṃ paryupāsitavyaḥ, yathāhaṃ paśyāmi yathāhaṃ vande yathāhaṃ paryupāse |
T02bsu052_u:32: evaṃ tathāgato dṛṣṭo bhavati vanditaḥ paryupāsitaśca |
T02bsu052_u:33: ahaṃ ca bhagavan sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśastathāgataṃ paśyāmi |
T02bsu052_u:34: bhagavānāha - kathaṃ mañjuśrīstathāgato draṣṭavyo yāvat paryupāsitavyaḥ? mañjuśrīrāha -
T02bsu052_u:36: evamanutpādākāreṇa tathāgataṃ paśyāmi, yāvad abhāvākāreṇa tathāgataṃ
T02bsu052_u:38: na ca tathatā samudāgacchati, evaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyāmi |
T02bsu052_u:39: na tathatā bhavati na vibhavati, evaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyāmi |
T02bsu052_u:40: na tathatā deśasthā na pradeśasthā, evaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyāmi |
T02bsu052_u:41: na tathatā atītā na anāgatā na pratyutpannā, evaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyāmi |
T02bsu052_u:42: na tathatā dvayaprabhāvitā nādvayaprabhāvitā, evaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyāmi |
T02bsu052_u:43: na tathatā saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate, evaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyāmi |
T02bsu052_u:44: na tathatā utpadyate na nirudhyate, evaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyāmi |
T02bsu052_u:45: evaṃ tathāgato dṛṣṭo bhavati vanditaḥ paryupāsitaśca |
T02bsu052_u:46: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - evaṃ paśyaṃstvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ kiṃ paśyasi?
T02bsu052_u:47: mañjuśrīrāha - evaṃ paśyannahaṃ bhagavan na kiṃcitpaśyāmi |
T02bsu052_u:48: evamahaṃ paśyan na kasyaciddharmasyotpādaṃ paśyāmi na nirodhaṃ paśyāmi ||
T02bsu052_u:50: duṣkarakārakastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ, yastvaṃ tathāgatamevaṃ paśyasi evaṃ
T02bsu052_u:51: paryupāsse, yasya ca te sarvasattvānāmantike mahāmaitrī pratyupasthitā |
T02bsu052_u:52: na ca te kācitsattvopalabdhiḥ sattvābhiniveśo vā |
T02bsu052_u:55: sarvasattvānāṃ ca te kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ |
T02bsu052_u:57: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat - evametad bhadanta śāradvatīputra yathā kathayasi |
T02bsu052_u:59: na ca me kācit sattvopalabdhirvā sattvābhiniveśo vā |
T02bsu052_u:60: nāyaṃ bhadanta śāradvatīputra saṃnāha evaṃ saṃnaddhaḥ - kathamahaṃ sattvadhātorūnatvaṃ vā kuryāṃ pūrṇatvaṃ vā? sacedbhadanta śāradvatīputra parikalpamupādāya ekaikasmin buddhakṣetre gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyuḥ, ekaikaśca tathāgato gaṅgānadīvālukopamān
T02bsu052_u:61: kalpāṃstiṣṭhet sarātriṃdivaṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayamānaḥ, ekaikayā dharmadeśanayā yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukāsamairbuddhairbhagavadbhiḥ sattvā vinītāḥ, tāvataḥ sattvānekaikastathāgataḥ ekaikayā dharmadeśanayā vinayet,
T02bsu052_u:62: evamapi kṛtvā naiva sattvadhātorūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate |
T02bsu052_u:63: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? sattvaviviktatvāt sattvāsattvād bhadanta śāradvatīputra sattvadhātorna conatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate ||
T02bsu052_u:64: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - yadi mañjuśrīḥ sattvaviviktatvāt sattvāsattvāt sattvadhātornaivonatvaṃ na
T02bsu052_u:65: pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate, tatkasyedānīṃ bodhimabhisaṃbudhya dharmaṃ
T02bsu052_u:66: deśayiṣyasi? evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat - yadā tāvadbhadanta śāradvatīputra atyantatayā
T02bsu052_u:67: sattvānupalabdhiḥ, tatko 'trābhisaṃbhotsyate? (SaptaŚ, Vaidya 342) kasya vā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyate? tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra atyantatayā sarvadharmānupalabdhiḥ ||
T02bsu052_u:68: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - yadā tāvanmañjuśrīḥ atyantatayā sarvadharmānupalabdhiḥ, tatkimidānīṃ sattvamapi prajñāpayiṣyasi? api ca |
T02bsu052_u:69: sacenmañjuśrīḥ kaścidevaṃ pṛcchet - kiyantaḥ sattvā iti, kiṃ tasya tvaṃ vadeḥ? mañjuśrīrāha - tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ
T02bsu052_u:70: pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam - yāvanta eva buddhadharmā iti |
T02bsu052_u:71: saced bhagavan punarapi pṛcchet - kiyatpramāṇaḥ sattvadhāturiti, tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ
T02bsu052_u:73: bhagavānāha - sacetpunarapi te mañjuśrīḥ kaścidevaṃ pṛcchet -
T02bsu052_u:74: kiṃparyāpannaḥ sattvadhāturiti, kiṃ tasya tvaṃ vadeḥ? mañjuśrīrāha -
T02bsu052_u:75: tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam - yatparyāpannānutpādācintyatā
T02bsu052_u:77: bhagavānāha - sacetpunarapi te mañjuśrīḥ kaścidevaṃ pṛcchet -
T02bsu052_u:78: kiṃpratiṣṭhitaḥ sattvadhāturiti, kiṃ tasya tvaṃ vadeḥ? mañjuśrīrāha -
T02bsu052_u:79: tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam - yatpratiṣṭhito 'nutpādadhātuḥ
T02bsu052_u:81: bhagavānāha - yasmin samaye tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi, tadā kutra pratiṣṭhitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi? mañjuśrīrāha - yasminnahaṃ bhagavan samaye prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayāmi, apratiṣṭhito 'haṃ tasmin samaye prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayāmi ||
T02bsu052_u:82: bhagavānāha - apratiṣṭhitasya te mañjuśrīḥ kā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā?
T02bsu052_u:83: mañjuśrīrāha - saiva bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yanna kvacitpratiṣṭhānam ||
T02bsu052_u:84: bhagavānāha - yasmin samaye tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi,
T02bsu052_u:85: kataratte kuśalamūlaṃ tasmin samaye upacayaṃ gacchati apacayaṃ vā?
T02bsu052_u:86: mañjuśrīrāha - na me bhagavan tasmin samaye kiṃcitkuśalamūlamupacayaṃ
T02bsu052_u:88: nāsau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati yasya kasyaciddharmasya upacayo vā apacayo vā bhavati |
T02bsu052_u:89: na sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā veditavyā, yā kasyaciddharmasya upacayāya vā apacayāya vā pratyupasthitā |
T02bsu052_u:90: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjanadharmān jahāti, nāpi buddhadharmānupādatte
T02bsu052_u:92: tathā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā na kasyaciddharmasyopalambhena pratyupasthitā yaṃ dharmaṃ prajahyādupādadīta vā |
T02bsu052_u:93: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva saṃsāradoṣānupayāti na nirvāṇaguṇān |
T02bsu052_u:94: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan saṃsārameva tāvann samanupaśyāmi, kaḥ punarvādaḥ saṃsāradoṣān
T02bsu052_u:95: nirvāṇameva tāvannopalabhe, kaḥ punarvādo nirvāṇaguṇān drakṣyāmi |
T02bsu052_u:96: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yanna kasyaciddharmasyādānaṃ vā grahaṇaṃ vā niḥsaraṇaṃ vā
T02bsu052_u:97: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasya hānirvā vṛddhirvopalabhyate
T02bsu052_u:98: | tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi bhagavan anutpādo hīyate vā vardhate vā |
T02bsu052_u:99: (SaptaŚ, Vaidya 343) yaivaṃ bhagavan bhāvanā, sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā |
T02bsu052_u:100: sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati vā nirodhayati vā |
T02bsu052_u:101: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasyonatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā karoti |
T02bsu052_u:102: yā bhagavan evaṃ bhāvanā, saiva prajñāpāramitābhāvanā |
T02bsu052_u:103: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitabhāvanā yā naivācintyān dharmān prārthayate na prādeśikān
T02bsu052_u:104: api tu khalu punarbhagavan tadapi na saṃvidyate yatprārthayate, yena prārthayate, yatra prārthayate
T02bsu052_u:106: evaṃ pratyupasthitā ime dharmā agrāḥ ime dharmā hīnā iti |
T02bsu052_u:107: nāpi tān dharmānupalabhate yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāmagratā vā hīnatā vā syāt |
T02bsu052_u:109: na bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā kaṃciddharmamagraṃ vā hīnaṃ vā kalpayati |
T02bsu052_u:110: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi bhagavan anutpādasya kiṃcidagraṃ vā hīnaṃ vā,
T02bsu052_u:111: nāpi tathatāyā bhūtakoṭyāḥ, yāvat sarvadharmāṇāṃ kiṃcidagraṃ vā hīnaṃ vā |
T02bsu052_u:113: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - na punarmañjuśrīḥ agrā buddhadharmāḥ? mañjuśrīrāha - agrāhyatvādbhagavan agrā buddhadharmāḥ |
T02bsu052_u:114: tatkiṃ punarbhagavan sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti tathāgatenābhisaṃbuddhāḥ? bhagavānāha - evametanmañjuśrīḥ śūnyāḥ sarvadharmāstathāgatenābhisaṃbuddhāḥ |
T02bsu052_u:115: mañjuśrīrāha - tatkiṃ punarbhagavan śūnyatāyā agratā vā hīnatā prajñāyate? bhagavānāha - sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ, evametanmañjuśrīḥ yathā kathayasi |
T02bsu052_u:118: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan teṣvaṇurapi dharmo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate |
T02bsu052_u:120: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na buddhadharmāṇāmārādhanāya saṃvartate na pṛgjanadharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya saṃvartate |
T02bsu052_u:123: punaraparaṃ sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā draṣṭavyā yā na kaṃciddharmaṃ cintayati na vijānīte
T02bsu052_u:126: cintayeyamahaṃ bhagavan buddhadharmān, sacedahaṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ pariniṣpattiṃ paśyeyam |
T02bsu052_u:127: na bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā kasyaciddharmasya vikalpena pratyupasthitā - ime pṛthagjanadharmāḥ, ime śrāvaka dharmāḥ, ime pratyekabuddhadharmāḥ ime samyaksaṃbuddhadharmā iti |
T02bsu052_u:129: tameva bhagavan dharmaṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyuktaḥ kulaputro nopalabhate, yasyaitān dharmān pṛthagjanadharmān vā nirdiśet,
T02bsu052_u:130: śaikṣadharmān vā nirdiśet, aśaikṣadharmān vā nirdiśet,
T02bsu052_u:134: na bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyuktasya kulaputrasyaivaṃ bhavati - ayaṃ
T02bsu052_u:135: kāmadhātuḥ, ayaṃ rūpadhātuḥ, ayamārūpyadhātuḥ, yāvad ayaṃ nirodhadhāturiti
T02bsu052_u:136: | tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi sa bhagavan na kaściddharmaḥ, yo nirodhadharmaṃ samanupaśyati
T02bsu052_u:138: (SaptaŚ, Vaidya 344) punaraparaṃ bhagavan eṣā sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā
T02bsu052_u:139: na kasyaciddharmasyopakāraṃ vā apakāraṃ vā karoti |
T02bsu052_u:140: na hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā buddhadharmāṇāṃ dhātrī, na pṛthagjanadharmāṇāmācchetrī
T02bsu052_u:141: eṣaiva sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ, na buddhadharmāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ, na buddhadharmāṇāṃ pratilambhaḥ ||
T02bsu052_u:142: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ yastvamimamevaṃrūpaṃ gambhīraṃ dharmaṃ deśayasi |
T02bsu052_u:143: sthāpitā te mañjuśrīriyaṃ mudrā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām, ābhimānikānāṃ ca śrāvakāṇām, aupalambhikānāṃ ca bodhisattvayānikānāṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ pratibodhāya |
T02bsu052_u:144: na te mañjuśrīḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā ekabuddhaparyupāsitā bhaviṣyanti naikabuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlāḥ, ye imaṃ gambhīraṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante api tu khalu punarmañjuśrīḥ atikramya te buddhasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlā bhaviṣyanti, ye imaṃ
T02bsu052_u:145: prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyanti, notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante
T02bsu052_u:146: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - pratibhāti me bhagavan bhūyasyā mātrayā prajñāpāramitānirdeśaḥ |
T02bsu052_u:149: prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasya sthitimupalabhate nāsthitim
T02bsu052_u:151: eṣaiva sa bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā veditavyā, yā na kasyaciddharmasyādhyālambanāya pratyupasthitā |
T02bsu052_u:152: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nirālambanāḥ sarvadharmāḥ |
T02bsu052_u:154: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā draṣṭavyā yatra buddhadharmā api nābhimukhībhavanti kutaḥ punaḥ pratyekabuddhadharmāḥ |
T02bsu052_u:155: nāpi śrāvakadharmā abhimukhībhavanti, kaḥ punarvādaḥ pṛthagjanadharmāṇām ||
T02bsu052_u:156: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā(yāṃ?) bhāvanāmāgamya acintyānapi buddhadharmānacintyā buddhadharmā iti na vikalpamāpadyate |
T02bsu052_u:157: seyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvadharmāvikalpāya draṣṭavyā
T02bsu052_u:158: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā(yāṃ?) bhāvanāmāgamya sarvadharmān buddhadharmān paśyati, sarvadharmānacintyadharmān paśyatyasamanupaśyanatayā |
T02bsu052_u:159: bahubuddhaśatasahasraparyupāsitāste bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca bhaviṣyanti ye imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyante nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpātsyante punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yāṃ na kaściddharmaḥ saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā samanupaśyati |
T02bsu052_u:161: sā caiṣā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjananānātvaṃ karoti, na śrāvakanānātvam, na pratyekabuddhanānātvam,
T02bsu052_u:164: (SaptaŚ, Vaidya 345) atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - kiyantastvayā mañjuśrīḥ tathāgatāḥ
T02bsu052_u:165: paryupāsitāḥ? mañjuśrīrāha - yāvanto bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya cittacaitasikā
T02bsu052_u:166: niruddhāḥ, iyanto mayā bhagavan tathāgatāḥ paryupāsitāḥ |
T02bsu052_u:167: bhagavānāha - na tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ buddhadharmasaṃsthitaḥ? mañjuśrīrāha - kaścitpunarbhagavan sa dharma upalabhyate yo na buddhadharmasaṃsthitaḥ? bhagavānāha - kasya punarmañjuśrīḥ ete buddhadharmāḥ? mañjuśrīrāha - bhagavan tava tāvadete
T02bsu052_u:168: buddhadharmā iti nāma na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punaranyeṣāṃ bhaviṣyati?
T02bsu052_u:169: bhagavānāha - prāptā te mañjuśrīrasaṅgatā? mañjuśrīrāha - tadyadā tāvadahaṃ bhagavan na saṅgataiva, tatkiṃ bhūyo 'hamasaṅgatāmanuprāpsyāmi?
T02bsu052_u:171: bhagavāneva tāvadbodhimaṇḍe na niṣaṇṇaḥ, kathaṃ punarahaṃ niṣatsyāmi
T02bsu052_u:172: bhūtakoṭiṃ pramāṇīkṛtya? bhagavānāha - bhūtakoṭiriti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam? mañjuśrīrāha - bhūtakoṭiriti bhagavan satkāyasyaitadadhivacanam |
T02bsu052_u:174: vadasi? mañjuśrīrāha - asanneṣa bhagavan kāyo na satkāyaḥ |
T02bsu052_u:177: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - niyatāste bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti bodhaye, ye imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyante notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti saṃtrāsamāpatsyante ||
T02bsu052_u:178: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat -
T02bsu052_u:179: āsannībhūtāste bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti bodhaye, ye imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyante, notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante |
T02bsu052_u:180: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? eṣaiva bhagavan paramā bodhiḥ, yaiṣāṃ dharmāṇāmanubodhanā ||
T02bsu052_u:181: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - buddhā eva te
T02bsu052_u:182: bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā draṣṭavyāḥ, ye imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ
T02bsu052_u:183: śrutvā adhimokṣyante, notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante |
T02bsu052_u:186: atha khalu nirālambā bhaginī bhagavantametadavocat - na te bhagavan
T02bsu052_u:187: bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pṛthagjanadharmān śrāvakadharmān pratyekabuddhadharmān samyaksaṃbuddhadharmānadhyāmbiṣyante, ye imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyante, notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante |
T02bsu052_u:193: niyatāste kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca bhaviṣyanti bodhaye, ye imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā
T02bsu052_u:195: avinivartanīyabhūmau tvaṃ (SaptaŚ, Vaidya 346) śāradvatīputra pratiṣṭhitāṃstān kulaputrān
T02bsu052_u:196: kuladuhitaraśca jānīṣva, ye imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā
T02bsu052_u:197: adhimokṣyante, nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante,
T02bsu052_u:199: te te śāradvatīputra paramadānapatayo bhaviṣyanti mahādānapatayo viśiṣṭadānapatayaḥ |
T02bsu052_u:200: te te śāradvatīputra śīlasaṃpannā bhaviṣyanti paramaśīlavantaḥ
T02bsu052_u:202: adhimokṣyante, nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante |
T02bsu052_u:203: te te śāradvatīputra paramayā kṣāntyā, parameṇa vīryeṇa, paramairdhyānaiḥ,
T02bsu052_u:205: te te śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yāvat sarvakāravaropetena sarvajñajñānena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti, ye imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ
T02bsu052_u:206: śrutvā adhimokṣyante, notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante ||
T02bsu052_u:207: punaraparaṃ bhagavan mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūmetadavocat - kaṃ punastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan icchasyanuttarāṃ
T02bsu052_u:212: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ, yastvamimānyevaṃrūpāṇi gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni nirdiśasi |
T02bsu052_u:214: mañjuśrīrāha - labdha eva bhagavan dharmaḥ syāt, yadyahamanupalambhacārī syām ||
T02bsu052_u:215: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - paśyasi tvaṃ mañjuśrīrimāṃ mama śrāvakasaṃpadam? mañjuśrīrāha paśyāmi bhagavan |
T02bsu052_u:216: bhagavānāha - kathaṃ paśyasi? mañjuśrīrāha - tathāhaṃ bhagavan paśyāmi
T02bsu052_u:217: yathā naiva pṛthagjanāna paśyāmi, naiva śaikṣān paśyāmi, naivāśaikṣān paśyāmi |
T02bsu052_u:218: nāpi paśyāmi, nāpi naiva paśyāmi, evaṃ paśyāmi |
T02bsu052_u:222: yastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ śrāvakayānikānevaṃ paśyasi, samyaksaṃbuddhayānikān punastvaṃ kathaṃ paśyasi? mañjuśrīrāha - bodhisattva iti bhadanta
T02bsu052_u:223: śāradvatīputra nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi, bodhāya saṃprasthita iti
T02bsu052_u:225: bodhāya caratīti nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi |
T02bsu052_u:226: abhisaṃbudhyata iti nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi |
T02bsu052_u:228: śāradvatīputra āha - tathāgataṃ punastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ kathaṃ paśyasi? mañjuśrīrāha -
T02bsu052_u:232: buddha iti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam? mañjuśrīrāha - yatpunarbhadanta śāradvatīputra ucyate ātmeti, kasyaitadadhivacanam? śāradvatīputra āha -
T02bsu052_u:235: (SaptaŚ, Vaidya 347) evametadbhadanta śāradvatīputra yasyaitadadhivacanamātmeti, tasyaitadadhivacanaṃ buddha iti |
T02bsu052_u:236: api tu bhadanta śāradvatīputra apadādhivacanametad yadidamucyate buddha iti |
T02bsu052_u:237: na hyetadbhadanta śāradvatīputra vācābhirvijñāpayituṃ buddha iti |
T02bsu052_u:238: vāgapi bhadanta śāradvatīputra na sukarā nirūpayitum - iyaṃ vāgiti, kutaḥ punarbuddha iti
T02bsu052_u:239: api tu bhadanta śāradvatīputra yadevaṃ vadasi -
T02bsu052_u:240: kasyaitadadhivacanaṃ buddha iti, yo na samudāgato notpanno na nirotsyate,
T02bsu052_u:241: yo na kenaciddharmeṇa samanvāgato nāpyatra kiṃcitpadamabhedam,
T02bsu052_u:242: apadasyaitadbhadanta śāradvatīputra adhivacanaṃ yaduta buddha iti |
T02bsu052_u:243: tathāgataṃ bhadanta śāradvatīputra paryeṣitukāmena ātmā paryeṣitavyaḥ |
T02bsu052_u:245: yathā ātmā atyantatayā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, tathā buddho 'pyatyantatayā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate |
T02bsu052_u:246: yathā ātmā na kenaciddharmeṇa vacanīyaḥ, tathā buddho 'pi na kenaciddharmeṇa vacanīyaḥ |
T02bsu052_u:247: yatra na kācitsaṃkhyā, sa ucyate buddha iti |
T02bsu052_u:249: yadadhivacanam, evametadbhadanta śāradvatīputra na sukaramājñātuṃ buddha iti yadadhivacanam
T02bsu052_u:250: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - nāyaṃ bhagavan mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastathā deśayati yathā ādikarmikā bodhisattvā ājānīyuḥ
T02bsu052_u:252: nāhaṃ bhadanta śāradvatīputra tathā deśayāmi yathā kṛtāvino 'pyarhanta
T02bsu052_u:255: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na bodhiḥ kenacidvijñātā, nāpi saṃbuddhā, na dṛṣṭā, na
T02bsu052_u:256: śrutā, na smṛtā, notpāditā, na nirodhitā, noddiṣṭā, nopadeśitā |
T02bsu052_u:259: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na bodhyā kiṃcidabhisaṃboddhavyam, nāpi bodhirbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate ||
T02bsu052_u:261: mañjuśrīrāha - na bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhagavatā dharmadhāturabhisaṃbuddhaḥ |
T02bsu052_u:264: sacedbhadanta śāradvatīputra bhagavatā dharmadhāturabhisaṃbuddhaḥ syāt, tadyo 'sāvanutpādadhātuḥ sa nirudhyo bhavet |
T02bsu052_u:265: api tu bhadanta śāradvatīputra sa eva dharmadhāturbodhiḥ
T02bsu052_u:271: avijñaptikamiti bhadanta śāradvatīputra naitacchakyaṃ vijñāpayituṃ saṃskṛtatvena vā yāvad asaṃskṛtatvena vā |
T02bsu052_u:275: tathā hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ prādurbhāvo nāsti yasmin sthitvā vijñapyeran |
T02bsu052_u:282: naiva te svargagāminaḥ, na apāyagāminaḥ, na parinirvāṇagāminaḥ |
T02bsu052_u:283: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi acintyaṃ gamanāgamanena pratyupasthitam, yāvat na parinirvāṇaṃ gamanāgamanena pratyupasthitam |
T02bsu052_u:284: ye 'pi bhadanta śāradvatīputra catasṛṣu mūlāpattiṣvavasthitāḥ, amūle te 'vasthitāḥ |
T02bsu052_u:285: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra anutpādasya mūlaṃ vā agraṃ vā iṣyate |
T02bsu052_u:288: adhikasamārope bhadanta sāradvatīputra caran loke dakṣiṇīyo bhavati |
T02bsu052_u:291: śrāddho bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurnārhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum |
T02bsu052_u:292: aśrāddho bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurarhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum |
T02bsu052_u:293: kalpito bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurnārhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum |
T02bsu052_u:294: akalpiko bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurarhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum |
T02bsu052_u:296: śāradvatīputra āha - kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi? mañjuśrīrāha - na samatā samupahatā, yā samatā saiva sā netrī |
T02bsu052_u:297: idaṃ saṃdhāya bhadanta śāradvatīputra evaṃ vadāmi - asamupahatanetrīko bhikṣurarhan kṣīṇāsrava
T02bsu052_u:301: śāradvatīputra āha - kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi? mañjuśrīrāha - aṇūnyapi tasya bhayāni na saṃvidyante |
T02bsu052_u:302: tatkimuttariṣyati? idaṃ saṃdhāya bhadanta śāradvatīputra evaṃ vadāmi -
T02bsu052_u:304: śāradvatīputra āha - anutpannakṣāntika iti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam?
T02bsu052_u:305: mañjuśrīrāha - yena bhadanta śāradvatīputra aṇurapi dharmo notpāditaḥ, sa ucyate 'nutpannakṣāntika iti ||
T02bsu052_u:306: śāradvatīputra āha - avinīto bhikṣuriti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam?
T02bsu052_u:307: mañjuśrīrāha - avinīto bhikṣuriti bhadanta śāradvatīputra arhataḥ kṣīṇāsravasyaitadadhivacanam
T02bsu052_u:308: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? avinayo hi vinītaḥ, na vinayo vinītaḥ |
T02bsu052_u:309: idaṃ saṃdhāya bhadanta śāradvatīputra evaṃ vadāmi -
T02bsu052_u:311: śāradvatīputra āha - adhicitte caratīti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam?
T02bsu052_u:312: mañjuśrīrāha - adhicitte caratīti bhadanta śāradvatīputra pṛthagjanasyaitadadhivacanam |
T02bsu052_u:313: śāradvatīputra āha - kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi? mañjuśrīrāha - tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra so 'dhikaroti ||
T02bsu052_u:314: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ, yathā arhan kṣīṇāsravastathā kathayasi |
T02bsu052_u:318: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra kṣīṇā me āsravāḥ ḥrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā |
T02bsu052_u:319: anena bhadanta ḥāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa kṣīṇāsravo na cārhan ||
T02bsu052_u:320: (SaptaŚ, Vaidya 349) atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - syānmañjuśrīḥ paryāyo yadbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo 'bhavyo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum?
T02bsu052_u:321: mañjuśrīrāhasyādbhagavan paryāyaḥ yabdodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇaḥ abhavyo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum |
T02bsu052_u:323: tathā hi bodhāvaṇurapi dharmo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate |
T02bsu052_u:327: tatra na kaściddharmaḥ saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, yo bodhimaṇḍe niṣīdet, yo vā bodhimabhisaṃbudhyet, yena vā bodhirabhisaṃbudhyeta, yo vā bodhimaṇḍāduttiṣṭhediti |
T02bsu052_u:328: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa abhavyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum
T02bsu052_u:329: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - bodhiriti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam? mañjuśrīrāha - bodhiriti bhagavan pañcānāmānantaryāṇāmetadadhivacanam |
T02bsu052_u:330: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi bodhiprakṛtikānyeva tāni pañcānantaryāṇi abhāvatvāt |
T02bsu052_u:332: bodhirānantaryaprakṛtikā, anantaryāṇāmabhisaṃbudhyanā bodhiḥ, na ca pratyakṣībhāvanā sarvadharmeṣu bodhiḥ |
T02bsu052_u:334: te na kenacidabhisaṃbuddhāḥ, na dṛṣṭāḥ, na
T02bsu052_u:337: api tu khalu punarbhagavan abhimānikaiḥ sthāpitānyetāni abhisaṃbudhāni(ddhā? ), yāvat pratyakṣīkṛtāni evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - kiṃ te mañjuśrīḥ
T02bsu052_u:338: mamāntike evaṃ bhavati - tathāgato me tathāgata iti? mañjuśrīrāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan |
T02bsu052_u:339: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na me bhagavan evaṃ bhavet - tathāgato me tathāgata iti |
T02bsu052_u:340: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? [tathā caiva tathatā ca] yathā ca tathātā, tathā caiṣa tathāgataḥ |
T02bsu052_u:341: tathā hi bhagavan na tathatā tathāgataṃ
T02bsu052_u:343: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan paramārthato 'bhāvā tathatā |
T02bsu052_u:345: tasmāttarhi bhagavan na me evaṃ bhavati - tathāgato me tathāgata iti |
T02bsu052_u:346: api tu tathāgata iti bhagavan nāmadheyamātrametat |
T02bsu052_u:347: tat kataro 'sau tathāgato yatra me evaṃ bhaviṣyati - tathāgato me tathāgata iti? bhagavānāha
T02bsu052_u:348: sa(tat?)saṃśayaste mañjuśrīstathāgate? mañjuśrīrāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan |
T02bsu052_u:349: syādatra me bhagavan saṃśayaḥ, sacet kācittathāgatapariniṣpattiḥ syat,
T02bsu052_u:351: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - na tava mañjuśrīrevaṃ bhavati - utpannastathāgata iti? mañjuśrīrāha - syānme bhagavan utpannastathāgata iti, saceddharmadhātorutpattiḥ syāt ||
T02bsu052_u:352: bhagavānāha - nādhimucyase tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ parinirvṛtā iti? mañjuśrīrāha - kaścit punarbhagavan ekaviṣayā
T02bsu052_u:357: mañjuśrīrāha - tena hi bhagavan ete gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavanto na parinirvṛtāḥ
T02bsu052_u:359: tathā hi bhagavan ekaviṣayā buddhā bhagavanto yadidamacintyaviṣayāḥ |
T02bsu052_u:360: na ca acintyatā utpadyate nirudhyate vā |
T02bsu052_u:361: tasmādbhagavan bhagavato vā abhisaṃbuddhena (ddhasya?) ye 'pi te anāgate 'dhvani tathagatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bhaviṣyanti, abhisaṃbuddhā eva te |
T02bsu052_u:362: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi acintyatā atītā vā anāgatā vā pratyutpannā vā |
T02bsu052_u:364: prapañcayanti te bhagavan lokasaṃniveśaṃ yeṣāmevaṃ bhavati - utpannastathāgato yāvat parinirvāsyati veti ||
T02bsu052_u:365: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - tena hi tvaṃ
T02bsu052_u:366: mañjuśrīḥ idaṃ tathāgatācintyam, acintyaṃ niścintyaṃ tathāgatasya vā agrata udāhārairudāhareḥ, avaivartikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vā arhato vā kṣīṇāsravasya |
T02bsu052_u:370: mañjuśrīrāha - acintyānāṃ niścintyānāṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ ko 'trānujñāsyati vā pratikrokṣyati
T02bsu052_u:371: bhagavānāha - yathaiva mañjuśrīḥ tathāgato niścintyaḥ, tathaiva pṛthagjanā api niścintyāḥ
T02bsu052_u:376: yathaiva tathāgato niścintyaḥ, evaṃ pṛthagjanā api niścintyā iti? nanu bhagavan pṛthagjanatvamapi niścintyam |
T02bsu052_u:384: bhagavan evamāhuḥ - ime pṛthagjanadharmāḥ, ime āryadharmā iti, te idaṃ vacanīyāḥ - kalyāṇamitrāṇi tāvatparyupāsadhvam, tataḥ paścājjñāsyatha -
T02bsu052_u:386: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - icchasi tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ tathāgataṃ sarvasattvānāmagryam? mañjuśrīrāha - iccheyamahaṃ bhagavan tathāgataṃ sarvasattvānāmagryam, sacediha kācitsattvapariniṣpattiḥ syāt |
T02bsu052_u:390: bhagavānāha - icchasi punastvaṃ mañjuśrīrevam - ime śrāvakāstathāgatena vinītā iti? mañjuśrīrāha - iccheyamahaṃ bhagavan evam - ime śrāvakāstathāgatena vinītā iti, sacet kaścidacintyadhātuvinayaṃ (SaptaŚ,
T02bsu052_u:392: na bhagavan buddhotpādaḥ kaśyacidupakāreṇa vā apakāreṇa vā pratyupasthitaḥ |
T02bsu052_u:394: dhātuḥ, asaṃkīrṇa eṣa dhātuḥ, yaduta acintyadhātuḥ |
T02bsu052_u:397: bhagavānāha - na tvaṃ mañjuśrīrevamicchasi - anuttaraṃ puṇyakṣetraṃ tathāgata iti? mañjuśrīrāha - abhāvatvābhdagavan puṇyakṣetraṃ tathagataḥ,
T02bsu052_u:401: api tu khalu punarbhagavan nātra kaściddharmaḥ samudāgacchati na kṣīyate |
T02bsu052_u:403: tatra ca bījaṃ prakṣiptaṃ na vivardhate na parihīyate |
T02bsu052_u:404: bhagavānāha - kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi - tatra kṣetre bījamavaropitaṃ na vivardhate
T02bsu052_u:405: parihīyate iti? mañjuśrīrāha - tathā hi bhagavan acintyaṃ tatkṣetram, evaṃ tatpuṇyakṣetram
T02bsu052_u:406: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ buddhānubhāvena ṣaḍvikāraṃ mahāpṛthivīcālo
T02bsu052_u:408: saptānāṃ bhikṣuṇīśatānāṃ trayāṇāṃ copāsakaśatānāṃ catvāriṃśataścopāsikāsahasrāṇāṃ ṣaṣṭeśca kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devakoṭīniyutaśatānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurutpannam ||
T02bsu052_u:409: atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsacīvaraṃ prāvṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumāṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - ko bhagavan hetuḥ, kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmāntamānandametadavocat - ayamānanda puṇyakṣetranirdeśo nāma
T02bsu052_u:411: ayamānanda hetuḥ, ayaṃ pratyayo 'sya mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya ||
